name: Topaz
description: Some gems have hidden qualities beyond their luster, beyond their shine...Topaz is one of those gems.

name: Ruby
description: Origin of the Ruby is unknown, hence its low value. It has a very high shine and 12 sides, however.

reviews.body: Don't waste your rubles on these rubies!
reviews.author: steve@ihaterubies.com

name: Opal
description: Opals are our most coveted and sought after gem. You will pay much to be the proud owner of this gorgeous and high shine gem.

reviews.body: This gem is WAY too expensive for its rarity value.
reviews.author: turtleguyy@zdn.me
